Name: Fairytale Figurine: You Can't See Me
Desc: A humanoid figurine ducking behind cover that can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nWhen danger approaches, residents of Constellation Metropole are said to use this method to conceal themselves, making it difficult for monsters to target them. Due to the widespread use of this concealment technique among the residents, it might be difficult for one to emerge as champion were a hide-and-seek competition to be held in the Metropole...
